title: Client Portal Guide
description: Complete guide for clients using the portal to track cases, view documents, and stay informed about legal proceedings.

welcome.title: Welcome to Your Client Portal
welcome.message: This secure portal gives you direct access to your case information, documents, and hearing schedules. You can track progress, download important files, and stay connected with your legal team - all from one convenient location.
keyBenefits: 24/7 access to case status and updates
Direct communication with your legal team

sections.title: Getting Started
sections.description: How to access and navigate your portal

content.overview: Your portal access is provided by your legal team. You'll receive login credentials via secure email.

steps.title: Receive Your Credentials
steps.description: Your legal team will send you a username and temporary password via email. Check your spam folder if you don't see it.

steps.title: Log In to the Portal
steps.description: Visit the portal URL provided and enter your credentials. You may be asked to change your password on first login.

steps.title: Navigate the Dashboard
steps.description: Your dashboard shows all your active cases, recent documents, and upcoming hearings at a glance.

steps.title: Set Up Notifications
steps.description: Configure how you receive alerts - by email, SMS, or both - for case updates and hearing reminders.

troubleshooting.solution: Contact your legal team to reset your password. For security, we cannot reset passwords via email.
After 5 failed login attempts, your account is locked for 30 minutes. Contact your legal team if you need immediate access.
Check your spam/junk folder. If not found, contact your legal team to resend the invitation.

sections.title: Viewing Your Cases
sections.description: Track the progress of your legal matters

content.overview: Each case linked to your account is displayed on your dashboard. Click any case to view detailed information.

whatYouCanSee.description: The official case identifier and reference number
Where your case stands in the legal process (e.g., 'Notice Stage', 'Hearing Scheduled', 'Order Issued')
The next important deadline or hearing date
The primary lawyer handling your case
A chronological history of all case events and milestones

statusMeanings.meaning: Case is ongoing with regular activity
A hearing has been scheduled and preparation is underway
Hearing completed; waiting for authority's decision
Case has concluded - view final outcome in case details

tips: Check your cases regularly - new documents or updates appear here first
The 'Last Updated' timestamp shows when the most recent change was made
Use the timeline view for a complete history of your case

content.overview: All documents your legal team shares with you are available in the Documents section. Files are organized by case and document type.

documentTypes.description: Official orders and decisions from authorities

actions.description: Click any document to open it in the built-in viewer
Click the download icon to save a copy to your device
If enabled by your legal team, you can upload documents for their review

content.securityNote: All documents are encrypted in transit and at rest. Only you and your authorized legal team can access your files.

content.overview: The Hearings section shows all scheduled hearings for your cases. You'll see upcoming dates, locations, and what to prepare.

hearingDetails.description: Physical address or virtual meeting link
The judicial body or authority conducting the hearing
What will be discussed or decided
What you may need to bring or prepare

afterHearing.title: After a Hearing
afterHearing.description: Once a hearing concludes, you'll see the outcome recorded here. This includes the result (adjournment, order, etc.) and any notes from your legal team.

notifications: You'll receive reminders 7 days, 3 days, and 1 day before each hearing
Any date changes are immediately notified
Hearing outcomes are notified once recorded

sections.title: Managing Notifications
sections.description: Stay informed with alerts and updates

content.overview: The portal sends notifications for important events. You control how and when you receive these alerts.

notificationTypes.description: When new documents are shared with you
Stage changes or significant case developments
When action may be required from you

deliveryChannels.description: Detailed notifications to your email address
Brief alerts to your mobile (if configured)
All notifications are stored in your portal for reference

content.managingPreferences: Contact your legal team to adjust notification preferences.

content.overview: If you have questions about your case or need assistance with the portal, your legal team is here to help.

contactMethods.description: Use the 'Contact Team' button to send a secure message
For urgent matters, call the office during business hours

commonQuestions.question: Why can't I see a specific document?
commonQuestions.answer: Your legal team controls which documents are visible in the portal. Contact them if you believe a document is missing.

commonQuestions.question: How do I update my contact information?
commonQuestions.answer: Contact your legal team to update your email, phone, or address on file.

commonQuestions.question: Can I share portal access with others?
commonQuestions.answer: For security reasons, sharing credentials is not recommended. Contact your legal team if another person needs access.

securityInformation.title: Your Security
securityInformation.content: We take the security of your information seriously. Here's how we protect you:

measures.description: All data is transmitted using bank-grade encryption (TLS 1.3)
Documents are encrypted at rest and stored in secure data centers
All portal access is logged for security monitoring
Your session automatically expires after inactivity to prevent unauthorized access

yourResponsibilities: Log out when using shared or public computers
Report any suspicious activity to your legal team immediately
Keep your contact information up to date for security notifications
